{{Cleanup|date=June 2010}} '''Portable application creators''' allow the creation of [[portable applications]] (also called: portable apps). They usually use [[application virtualization]].
== Creators of independent portable applications == No ''agent'' or ''client'' is required for these (also called "agentless" solutions):
*[http://www.appzero.com AppZero] *[http://boxedapp.com/ BoxedApp] *[http://www.cameyo.com/ Cameyo] *[http://www.enigmaprotector.com/ Enigma Virtual Box] *[http://www.installfree.com/the-installfree-bridge/ InstallFree Bridge] *[http://jauntepe.sourceforge.net/ JauntePE (alpha, free)] *[[Ceedo]], using [http://apps.ceedo.com/addons/eng/argo/ Argo Application Installer] *[http://www.spoon.net/Studio/ Spoon Studio] (formerly [[Xenocode Virtual Application Studio]]) *[[VMware ThinApp]] (formerly: Thinstall) *[http://www.landesk.com/products/application-virtualization.aspx LANDesk Application Virtualization] *[http://www.molebox.com/ MoleBox Virtualization Solution]
